title: Fix pre-push hook errors
description: Pre-push hook has multiple issues: 'bad math expression: operator expected at 0' error on line 105, and checks for missing functions (ralph-init, ralph-archive) that were removed/renamed in MP-006.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update function completeness check - remove ralph-init (now ralph-setup)
Update function completeness check - remove ralph-archive (now archive subcommand)
Verify pre-push hook runs without errors
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-032 fix pre-push hook errors
